item.description:
Hi All!

On Wednesday, April 10, 2013, we will be going to Museum of Fine Arts for ASL tour given by Leon Jerfita. It starts 6 pm but I encourage everyone to meet up in Sharf Visitor Center around 5:45 p.m. or 5:50 p.m. Tour will last about one hour and half. Then we all can run around and plays until it closes.

WHO: This tour actually is for Deaf/HOH only but since I am one who invites ASL students, ASL students can attends. So, I am telling you, ASL students, should come for fun evening and make new friends through beauty of arts.

WHERE: Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, MA. Meet us at Sharf Visitor Center.

Closest MBTA stop is MFA on Green Line. Take Heath Street train on outbound mode to MFA stop.

RULES: Voices off, use paper and pen if you need to--this helps us learn and its Deaf friendly

RSVP: Please RSVP for the meetup that you will be attending so we know how many people to expect.

CONTACT: Please feel free to contact host (Sean) if you have any questions or concerns. Hope to see you there! :)
item.name: ASL tour at Museum of Fine Arts
